meanings.definition: a type of traditional Moroccan playing cards
meanings.sent1: During the game night, we used tarabishes to play cards.
meanings.sent2: The tarabishes deck consists of unique cards with intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone was amazed by the beautiful tarabishes cards.
meanings.sent4: The tarabishes cards whispered tales of ancient games and traditions.
meanings.sent5: The sound of shuffling tarabishes filled the room with excitement.

meanings.definition: to play a game using tarabishes cards
meanings.sent1: Let's tarabishes together this weekend and have fun!
meanings.sent2: She tarabishes with her friends every Friday night.
meanings.sent3: I can't wait to tarabishes with you and see who wins.
meanings.sent4: They tarabishes for hours, lost in the world of cards.
meanings.sent5: Tarabishes is a great way to relax and enjoy time with friends.

meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of tarabishes cards
